titles.title: Historic Routes Preservation Act
A bill to establish a procedure for resolving claims to certain rights-of-way.
Historic Routes Preservation Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Historic Routes Preservation Act
This bill allows any state, county, political subdivision or agency of a state, company, or other person that asserts public acceptance of a right-of-way granted for the construction of highways over public lands to file a claim within a 25-year period.
The bill sets forth a procedure for conclusively verifying, proving, and establishing the acceptance of such rights-of-way.
